{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Star Piece |image = [[File:Star_Piece Updated.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Star Piece''. |value = 5 {{Diamonds}} |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Rare Hold Items]] *[[Dungeons]] |helditem =
*[[File:Jirachi.png|30px]]Jirachi }} ==Description== The '''Star Piece''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Star Piece has a value of 5 Diamonds {{Diamonds}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Mine Layout== The Star Piece appears in the Underground as a 3x3 sized object.

[[File:StarPieceMine.png|100px]] ==Acquisition== Star Pieces can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], as [[Rare Hold Items]] from [[File:Jirachi.png|30px]] Jirachi, and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Mt.
